synopsis.text: It's Valentine's Day and the girls at the Future Gadget Lab decide to celebrate by making chocolates together. However, they soon realize that Kagari has never celebrated Valentine's Day before. Determined to make her first Valentine's Day special, the girls set out to create homemade chocolates, though their quirks and inexperience in the kitchen lead to several mishaps along the way. As they struggle to finish the chocolates in time to give to their loved ones, the girls hope that their feelings will come across despite the chaotic chocolate-making process. Through perseverance and teamwork, they aim to ensure Kagari's first ever Valentine's Day is one filled with warmth, bonding, and sweet surprises.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
